multisite_git_state_tooltip_lastdeploy: View the information of the latest deployment
multisite_git_state_tooltip_disabled: Click the action button to link Git
multisite_tooltip_diagnostic_good_config: Your domain {{ domainName }} is configured to the IP address {{ ip }} of your hosting
multisite_tooltip_diagnostic_not_good_co: Your domain {{ domainName }} is configured to the IP address {{ ip }} of another service
multisite_tooltip_diagnostic_unconfigure: This entry in your DNS zone is not working. No configuration was found in your DNS zone
multisite_git_modal_delete_association_d: You are about to remove the Git association.
The deletion will apply to all domains pointing to your directory.
Do you wish to empty the contents of the directory {{ path }}?
multisite_git_modal_delete_association_w: We will remove the association with Git and the contents of the directory.
multisite_git_modal_delete_association_s: Your deletion has been successfully recorded.
multisite_cdn_modal_purge_description: Are you sure you want to clear your CDN cache?
multisite_cdn_modal_purge_success: Your CDN cache has been cleared successfully.
multisite_cdn_modal_purge_error: An error occurred while requesting the CDN cache cleanup. {{ message }}
multisite_add_website_choose_domain_titl: Choose how to associate your domain
multisite_add_website_existing_domain_ca: Associate an existing OVH cloud domain
Use a domain name already registered with OVHcloud.
multisite_add_website_external_domain_ca: Use a domain name registered with another provider.
multisite_add_website_order_domain_card_: The domain name will be managed by OVHcloud and automatically associated with your site.
multisite_add_website_configure_domain_d: The site and its root folder will bear this name. This is an internal name, visible only to you.
multisite_add_website_configure_domain_a: Your DNS zone will be configured automatically.
Enter the name of the folder that will contain your site's files.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_i: Choose the country in which you want to geolocate your site's IP address. This option can help with the SEO of your pages in search engines.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_f: Enable the application firewall to enhance your site's protection against attacks.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_c: The CDN speeds up the loading of your pages and enhances the security of your site by blocking malicious traffic.
multisite_add_website_advanced_options_d: Automatically creates A and AAAA records in your domain's DNS zone.
You will need to enter the specified records yourself in the DNS zone.
multisite_add_website_domain_management_: To ensure your domain is correctly linked to your site, please replace the DNS servers in your current provider's interface with those indicated below.
Insert a TXT field for the domain {{domain}} with the value
Point the {{field}} field of your domain {{domain}} to
Once the changes are applied, DNS propagation can take up to 48 hours to be fully effective.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_title: Choose the one-click module to install
multisite_add_website_module_cms_text: Easily create your site with a content management system (CMS) already installed on your hosting.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_none_te: No CMS will be installed. You will be able to create your site freely.
multisite_add_website_module_cms_choice_: A simple and popular CMS to easily create your site or blog.
A complete and powerful CMS, ideal for more advanced web projects.
A turnkey e-commerce solution to launch your online store.
A content management system to create custom blogs and e-commerce sites.
multisite_add_website_success: Your site has been successfully added! The association of your domain may take up to 48 hours.
multisite_add_website_error: An error has occurred while adding your site. {{ error }}
multisite_add_website_domain_info: The domain name is your site address
